column4: Hi, I am a Mint user and in switching to Ubuntu 11.10 Desktop any advice?
Honestly? Don't switch. If you plan to switch anyway, well, you should get used to the Unity desktop.
It's offtopic here, but basically, Ubuntu's current desktop (Unity) is hated by many people
I suggest you use Xubuntu, honestly, it's my favorite *buntu edition personally
does Xubuntu stil have all the featuers ubuntu has?
such as the software centre, music player thingy etc
Yeah, nowadays even more (due to Unity still being in development and not very powerful)
Alternate install disk, with text-mode installer
You don't need that unless you have weird hardware.
